* Blameless - Without fault
* Cleared of charges - Found not guilty

* Wrongfully accused - Falsely charged
* Guilt free - Clear conscience
* Innocent - Not guilty
* At fault - Responsible
* Caught in the act - In the wrong
* Committed crime - Guilty
* Criminal - One who has committed a crime
* Convict - A person who has been convicted of a crime
* Did it - Responsible for the action
* Perpetrator - One who has committed a crime
* Responsible for crime - Accountable for one's actions

I hope my answers have been helpful and respectful. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
